metadata.titleEn: Geochemical data of granite in Sungai Lembing tin deposit, pengheng, Malaysia
metadata.titleCn: 马来西亚彭亨Sungai Lembing锡矿床花岗岩地球化学数据
metadata.description: This data is for the whole rock major and trace, cassiterite U-Pb dating, zircon U-Pb dating, Lu Hf isotopic analysis and whole rock SR Nd isotopic analysis of granite in Sungai Lembing tin deposit, pengheng, Malaysia. The major element data of the whole rock were obtained by XRF analysis, trace element data by ICP-MS analysis, zircon U-Pb dating and in-situ Lu Hf isotopic composition data by la-mc-icp-ms analysis, cassiterite U-Pb dating by ICP-MS analysis, and whole rock SR Nd isotopic composition data by MC – ICP – MS analysis. The above data have been published in high-level SCI journals, and the data are true and reliable. The obtained data can limit (1) the age of magmatic mineralization（ 2) The genesis and magma source of granite related to mineralization（ 3) The eastern belt of the Peninsular Malaysia is characterized by extensive tin mineralization.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据为马来西亚彭亨Sungai Lembing锡矿床花岗岩全岩主微量、锡石U-Pb定年，锆石U-Pb定年及Lu-Hf同位素分析，以及全岩Sr-Nd同位素分析。全岩主量元素数据由XRF分析获得，微量元素数据由ICP-MS分析获得，锆石U-Pb定年及原位Lu-Hf同位素组成数据由LA-MC-ICP-MS分析获得，锡石U-Pb定年由ICP-MS分析获得，全岩Sr-Nd同位素由MC–ICP–MS分析获得。以上数据已发表于高级别SCI期刊，数据真实可靠。通过获得的数据，可以限制(1)岩浆成矿年龄；(2)与成矿有关的花岗岩的成因和岩浆来源；(3)马来西亚半岛东带广泛锡矿化的金属构造环境。
metadata.instructions: Geochemical data are stored in Excel format, and the sample name is "YY DD", where YY represents the sampling location and DD is the sample ordinal number
metadata.instructionsCn: 地球化学数据以excel格式存储，样品名称为“yy-dd”，其中yy代表采样地点，dd为样品序数

literatureList.titleEn: Genesis and timing of the Sungai Lembing tin deposit in Pahang, East Malaysia: Constraints from LA–ICP–MS zircon and cassiterite U–Pb dating, geochemical compositions and Sr–Nd–Hf isotopes.
literatureList.referenceEn: Du, G. F., Yang, X. Y., Cao, J. Y., & Aziz, J. H. A. (2020). Genesis and timing of the Sungai Lembing tin deposit in Pahang, East Malaysia: Constraints from LA–ICP–MS zircon and cassiterite U–Pb dating, geochemical compositions and Sr–Nd–Hf isotopes. Ore Geology Reviews, 119. doi:10.1016/j.oregeorev.2020.103364

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific features and methodologies used in the geochemical data collection of granite in relation to tin mineralization?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 与锡矿化相关的花岗岩地球化学数据收集的具体特征和方法包括哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: whole-rock major elements analyzed by XRF, trace elements by ICP-MS, zircon U-Pb dating, in-situ Lu-Hf isotope composition by LA-MC-ICP-MS, cassiterite U-Pb dating by ICP-MS, whole-rock Sr-Nd isotope analysis by MC-ICP-MS
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 全岩主量元素通过XRF分析，微量元素通过ICP-MS分析，锆石U-Pb定年通过LA-MC-ICP-MS进行原位Lu-Hf同位素组成分析，锡石U-Pb定年通过ICP-MS进行，全岩Sr-Nd同位素分析通过MC-ICP-MS进行。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many different isotopic analysis methods are used in a dataset related to the geochemistry of granite tin deposits in Malaysia?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在与马来西亚花岗岩锡矿床的地球化学相关的数据集中，使用了多少种不同的同位素分析方法？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'LA-MC-ICP-MS' mean in the context of geochemical data collection techniques?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在地球化学数据收集技术的背景下，“LA-MC-ICP-MS”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: LA-MC-ICP-MS stands for Laser Ablation Multi-Collector Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometry, a technique used for zircon U-Pb dating and Lu-Hf isotopic composition analysis in geochemical studies. It involves using a laser to ablate a small part of the sample, which is then analyzed by a mass spectrometer to determine isotopic ratios and elemental concentrations.
Definition.AnswerCn: LA-MC-ICP-MS代表激光剥蚀多收集器电感耦合等离子体质谱法，这是一种用于锆石U-Pb定年和Lu-Hf同位素组成分析的地球化学研究技术。该技术通过激光剥蚀样品的一小部分，然后由质谱仪分析以确定同位素比率和元素浓度。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of using a combination of XRF, ICP-MS, LA-MC-ICP-MS, and MC–ICP–MS methods on the reliability and granularity of geochemical data collected from granite deposits in Malaysia's Sungai Lembing tin mineralization context?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在马来西亚Sungai Lembing锡矿化背景下，使用XRF、ICP-MS、LA-MC-ICP-MS和MC–ICP–MS方法的组合对从花岗岩矿床收集的地球化学数据的可靠性和粒度可能产生的后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using a combination of these advanced analytical techniques enhances the reliability and granularity of the geochemical data by providing comprehensive elemental and isotopic analyses. This multi-method approach allows for precise determination of major and trace elements, as well as isotopic compositions and ages, which are crucial for understanding the magmatic and metallogenic processes. Consequently, it can effectively constrain the age of magmatic mineralization, the genesis and source of granites associated with mineralization, and the metallogenic tectonic setting of widespread tin mineralization in the East Belt of the Malay Peninsula.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用这些先进的分析技术的组合，通过提供全面的元素和同位素分析，增强了地球化学数据的可靠性和细粒度。这种多方法的 approach 允许精确确定主要和微量元素，以及同位素组成和年龄，这对于理解岩浆和成矿过程至关重要。因此，它可以有效地限制岩浆矿化的年龄、与矿化相关的花岗岩的成因和来源，以及马来半岛东带广泛锡矿化的成矿构造背景。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the purpose of collecting geochemical data from granites, zircon U-Pb dating, and isotopic analyses in tin mineral deposits in Malaysia's Pahang region?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集马来西亚彭亨地区锡矿床的花岗岩地球化学数据、锆石U-Pb定年和同位素分析的目的是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal is to determine the magmatic-mineralization age, understand the genesis and magmatic sources of mineralization-related granites, and explore the metallogenic tectonic environment of widespread tin mineralization in the eastern belt of the Malay Peninsula.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是确定与矿化相关的花岗岩的岩浆-矿化年龄，了解矿化相关花岗岩的成因和岩浆源，并探讨马来半岛东带广泛锡矿化的成矿构造环境。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are involved in conducting U-Pb dating on cassiterite and zircon minerals to determine the magmatic-mineralization age in granite deposits?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 进行铀铅（U-Pb）定年法对锡石和锆石矿物进行研究，以确定花岗岩矿床的岩浆-矿化年龄涉及哪些程序？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: U-Pb dating on cassiterite is conducted using ICP-MS analysis, while zircon U-Pb dating and in-situ Lu-Hf isotopic composition are obtained through LA-MC-ICP-MS analysis. These methods help in determining the age of magmatic-mineralization processes in granite deposits.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 对锡石进行U-Pb定年是通过ICP-MS分析进行的，而锆石的U-Pb定年和原位Lu-Hf同位素组成则是通过LA-MC-ICP-MS分析获得的。这些方法有助于确定花岗岩矿床中岩浆矿化过程的年龄。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What analytical techniques enable the comprehensive geochemical characterization of granitic rocks in tin deposits?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些分析技术能够对锡矿床中的花岗岩岩石进行全面的地球化学特征分析？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The comprehensive geochemical characterization of granitic rocks in tin deposits is enabled by techniques such as XRF analysis for major elements, ICP-MS for trace elements, LA-MC-ICP-MS for zircon U-Pb dating and in-situ Lu-Hf isotopic composition, ICP-MS for cassiterite U-Pb dating, and MC–ICP–MS for whole rock Sr-Nd isotopic analysis.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 锡矿床花岗岩的综合地球化学特征表征得益于多种技术，如XRF分析用于主要元素，ICP-MS用于微量元素，LA-MC-ICP-MS用于锆石U-Pb定年及原位Lu-Hf同位素组成分析，ICP-MS用于锡石U-Pb定年，以及MC–ICP–MS用于全岩Sr-Nd同位素分析。
